body: Looks like drug rape, but actually quite vanilla. Kaede, the boy, got many girls, but he never totally opens up and always keep Friday open to study with his childhood friend Mei, the model student. Their status is just friend though, because Mei rejected his advances. This time though, another guy who loves Mei shows up. When studying, she told about how that guy is nice, and her friends also suggest her to try dating him. So, jealous Kaede drugged her before another guy took her away. The twist in the end, Mei also likes him back, and she reallo enjoy seeing Kaede in panic or getting desperate. Back when they're still a child, she pretended to not noticing him, just to see him desperate to get her attention.
又是一個被套路的純情少年！
